mapper.select: select * from from le_system_resource where parent_id=#{parentId}

select re.perms from le_system_resource re left join le_role_resource rore on re.id=rore.resource_id left join le_user_authorization au on au.role_id=rore.role_id left join le_system_user user on user.user_account=au.user_account where user.user_account=#{userAccount}
select re.perms from le_system_resource re left join le_role_resource rore on re.id=rore.resource_id left join le_system_role role on role.id=rore.role_id where role.role_code=#{roleCode}
